channel.title: Silab Items NEED HELP
channel.description: what am i doin wrong i followed ticos guide and silab items just make you lose connection [code][client-1-owned ur ass]: playerCommand: skillcapes java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 14073 at client.addItem(client.java:12595) at client.customCommand(client.java:11350) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17977) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14509) at client.process(client.java:14479) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:47) Ultimate PK Server [fatal] - exception[/code]

item.title: Silab Items NEED HELP
item.dc:creator: @pkforlol3 pkforlol3
item.description:
@pkforlol3 wrote:

ur pickup, goes to 4 numbers only, set ur pickup like this:

		if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights > 2)) {
			String[] args = command.split(" ");
			if (args.length == 3) {
				int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
				int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
				if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
					addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
				} else {
					sendMessage("No such item.");
				}
			} else {
				sendMessage("usage Use as ::pickup 14073 100");
			}
		}

Read full topic
